financialInstitutionName.label: Financial Institution Name
financialInstitutionName.description: Enter the name of the financial institution that is submitting the HMDA data.

calendarYear.label: Calendar Year
calendarYear.description: Enter the calendar year of the data contained in the loan/application register using numerals in the form YYYY.

calendarQuarter.label: Calendar Quarter
calendarQuarter.description: Indicate the annual submission by entering the Code below.

codes.description: Annual submissions for covered loans and applications with respect to which final action was taken during the period between January 1st (01/01) and December 31st (12/31)

contactName.label: Contact Person’s Name
contactName.description: Enter the first and last name of the person who may be contacted with questions about your institution’s submission.

contactTelephoneNumber.label: Contact Person’s Telephone Number
contactTelephoneNumber.description: Enter the phone number of the person who may be contacted with questions about your institution’s submission.

contactEmailAddress.label: Contact Person’s E-mail Address
contactEmailAddress.description: Enter the e-mail address of the person who may be contacted with questions about your institution’s submission.

contactStreetAddress.label: Contact Person’s Office Street Address
contactStreetAddress.description: Enter the street address.  This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the street address are described under “Delivery Address Line” found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 23 Delivery Address Line.  Address components include, as applicable, the following individual items:

contactOfficeCity.label: Contact Person’s Office City
contactOfficeCity.description: Enter the city. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the city are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

contactOfficeState.label: Contact Person’s Office State
contactOfficeState.description: Enter the state. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the state are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

contactOfficeZip.label: Contact Person’s Office ZIP Code
contactOfficeZip.description: Enter the ZIP code. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the ZIP code are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

federalAgency.label: Federal Agency
federalAgency.description: Indicate your financial institution’s appropriate Federal Agency by entering the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC)
United States Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD)

numberOfEntries.label: Total Number of Entries Contained in Submission
numberOfEntries.description: Enter the total number of covered loans and applications submitted in numeral form.

federalTaxpayerIdentifcationNumber.label: Federal Taxpayer Identification Number
federalTaxpayerIdentifcationNumber.description: Enter your financial institution’s Federal Taxpayer Identification Number.

universalLoanIdentifier.label: Universal Loan Identifier (ULI)
universalLoanIdentifier.description: Enter the ULI assigned to the covered loan or application.

applicationDate.label: Application Date
applicationDate.description: Enter the date the application was received as defined in § 1003.2(b) or the date shown on the application form by year, month, and day, using numerals in the form YYYYMMDD.

loanType.label: Loan Type
loanType.description: Indicate the type of covered loan or application by entering the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Conventional (not insured or guaranteed by FHA, VA, RHS, or FSA)
USDA Rural Housing Service or the Farm Service Agency guaranteed (RHS or FSA)

loanPurpose.label: Loan Purpose
loanPurpose.description: Indicate the purpose of the covered loan or application by entering the applicable Code from the following:

preapproval.label: Preapproval
preapproval.description: Indicate whether the covered loan or application involved a request for preapproval for a home purchase loan under a preapproval program as defined in § 1003.2(b)(2) by entering the applicable Code from the following:

constructionMethod.label: Construction Method
constructionMethod.description: Indicate the construction method for the dwelling by entering the applicable Code from the following:

occupancyType.label: Occupancy Type
occupancyType.description: Indicate the occupancy type by entering the applicable Code from the following:

loanAmount.label: Loan Amount
loanAmount.description: Enter the amount, in dollars, of the covered loan or the amount applied for, as applicable.

actionTaken.label: Action Taken
actionTaken.description: Indicate the type of action taken on the covered loan or application by entering the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Preapproval request approved but not accepted

actionTakenDate.label: Action Taken Date
actionTakenDate.description: Enter the date of action taken by year, month, and day, using numerals in the form YYYYMMDD.

streetAddress.label: Street Address
streetAddress.description: Enter the street address.  This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the street address are described under “Delivery Address Line” found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 23 Delivery Address Line.  Address components include, as applicable, the following individual items:

city.label: City
city.description: Enter the city. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the city are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

state.label: State
state.description: Enter the state. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the state are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

zip.label: ZIP Code
zip.description: Enter the ZIP code. This will be reported as one (1) data field.  Details regarding recommended formatting of the ZIP code are found in Publication 28, Sub-Section 22 Last Line.

county.label: County
county.description: Enter the five-digit Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) numerical code for the state and county. These codes are available from the appropriate Federal agency to which your institution reports data.

censusTract.label: Census Tract
censusTract.description: Enter the 11 digit census tract number as defined by the U.S. Census Bureau.  Do not use decimals. Use the boundaries and codes that were in effect on January 1 of the calendar year for which your institution is reporting.

applicantEthnicity.label: Ethnicity of Applicant or Borrower
applicantEthnicity.description: Indicate the ethnicity of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, by selecting up to five (5) of the applicable Code(s) from the following:

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 14: Other Hispanic or Latino
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 14 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

codes.description: Information not provided by applicant in mail, internet, or telephone application

applicantEthnicityBasis.label: Ethnicity Collected on the Basis of Visual Observation or Surname
applicantEthnicityBasis.description: Indicate whether the ethnicity of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, was collected on the basis of visual observation or surname by selecting from the following:

codes.description: Collected on the basis of visual observation or surname
Not collected on the basis of visual observation or surname

applicantRace.label: Race of Applicant or Borrower
applicantRace.description: Indicate the race of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, by selecting up to five (5) of the applicable Code(s) from the following:

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 1: American Indian or Alaska Native.
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 1 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 27: Other Asian
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 27 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

codes.description: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 44: Other Pacific Islander
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 44 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

codes.description: Information not provided by applicant in mail, internet, or telephone application

applicantRaceBasis.label: Race Collected on the Basis of Visual Observation or Surname
applicantRaceBasis.description: Indicate whether the race of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, was collected on the basis of visual observation or surname by selecting from the following:

codes.description: Collected on the basis of visual observation or surname
Not collected on the basis of visual observation or surname

sexOfApplicant.label: Sex of Applicant or Borrower
sexOfApplicant.description: Indicate the sex of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, by selecting the appropriate Code from the following:

codes.description: Information not provided by applicant in mail, internet, or telephone application

applicantSexBasis.label: Sex Collected on the Basis of Visual Observation or Surname
applicantSexBasis.description: Indicate whether the sex of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable, was collected on the basis of visual observation or surname by selecting from the following:

codes.description: Collected on the basis of visual observation or surname
Not collected on the basis of visual observation or surname

ageOfApplicant.label: Age of Applicant or Borrower
ageOfApplicant.description: Enter the age in numeral form, in years, of the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable. Age is calculated, as of the application date, as the number of whole years derived from the date of birth shown on the application form. Or, use the applicable Code from the following:

income.label: Income
income.description: Enter the amount, in dollars, of the gross annual income that your institution relied on in making the credit decision, or if a credit decision was not made, the gross annual income relied on in processing the application.  Round all dollar amounts to the nearest thousand (round $500 up to the next $1,000).

typeOfPurchaser.label: Type of Purchaser
typeOfPurchaser.description: Indicate whether a covered loan that your institution originated or purchased was sold to a secondary market entity within the same calendar year as origination or purchase by using the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Commercial bank, savings bank, or savings association
Credit union, mortgage company, or finance company

rateSpread.label: Rate Spread
rateSpread.description: Enter the difference between the covered loan’s or application’s Annual Percentage Rate (APR) and the applicable Average Prime Offer Rate (APOR) as published on the FFEC website.

hoepaStatus.label: HOEPA Status
hoepaStatus.description: Indicate whether the covered loan that your institution originated or purchased is a high-cost mortgage as defined by the Home Ownership and Equity Protection Act of 1994 (HOEPA) using the applicable Code from the following:

lienStatus.label: Lien Status
lienStatus.description: Indicate the lien status for covered loans that your institution originates or purchases, as well as for applications that do not result in an origination using the applicable Code from the following:

applicantCreditScore.label: Credit Score of Applicant or Borrower
applicantCreditScore.description: Enter the credit score or scores, in numeral form, relied on in making the credit decision for the applicant or borrower, and of any co-applicant or co-borrower, if applicable. If Regulation C requires your institution to report a single score that corresponds to multiple applicants or borrowers, report the score in the applicant field.  Or, use the applicable Code from the following:

applicantScoreModel.label: Name and Version of Credit Scoring Model
applicantScoreModel.description: Indicate the name and version of the credit scoring model used to generate the credit score relied on in making the credit decision by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: More than one credit scoring model

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 8: Other credit scoring model
conditional.description: Other credit scoring model. This field will only contain a value if Code 8 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

denialReason.label: Reason for Denial
denialReason.description: Indicate the principal reason or reasons for denial by selecting up to four (4) applicable Codes from the following:

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 9: Other
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 9 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

totalLoanCosts.label: Total Loan Costs
totalLoanCosts.description: Enter, in dollars, the amount of total loan costs.

totalPointsAndFees.label: Total Points and Fees
totalPointsAndFees.description: Enter, in dollars, the total points and fees charged in connection with the covered loan.

originationCharges.label: Origination Charges
originationCharges.description: Enter, in dollars, the total of all itemized amounts that are designated borrower-paid at or before closing.

discountPoints.label: Discount Points
discountPoints.description: Enter, in dollars, the points paid to the creditor to reduce the interest rate.

lenderCredits.label: Lender Credits
lenderCredits.description: Enter, in dollars, the total amount of lender credits.

interestRate.label: Interest Rate
interestRate.description: Enter the interest rate in decimal format.

prepaymentPenaltyTerm.label: Prepayment Penalty Term
prepaymentPenaltyTerm.description: Enter the term in numeral form, in months, of any prepayment penalty applicable to the covered loan or application.

dtiRatio.label: Debt-to-Income Ratio
dtiRatio.description: Enter the ratio of the applicant’s or borrower’s total monthly debt to the total monthly income relied on in making the credit decision.

cltvRatio.label: Combined Loan-to-Value Ratio
cltvRatio.description: Enter the ratio of the total amount of debt secured by the property to the value of the property relied on in make the credit decision.

loanTerm.label: Loan Term
loanTerm.description: Enter the scheduled loan term in numeral form, in months, after which the legal obligation will mature or terminate or would have matured or terminated.

introductoryRatePeriod.label: Introductory Rate Period
introductoryRatePeriod.description: Enter in numeral form, the number of months, or proposed number of months in the case of an application, until the first date the interest rate may change after closing or account opening.

balloonPayment.label: Balloon Payment
balloonPayment.description: Indicate if the covered loan or application requires a payment that is more than two times a regular periodic payment by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

interestOnlyPayments.label: Interest-Only Payments
interestOnlyPayments.description: Indicate if the covered loan or application would permit one or more periodic payments to be applied solely to accrued interest and not to principal by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

negativeAmortization.label: Negative Amortization
negativeAmortization.description: Indicate if the covered loan or application would permit a minimum periodic payment that covers only a portion of the accrued interest, resulting in an increase in the principal balance under the terms of the legal obligation by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

otherNonAmortizingFeatures.label: Other Non-amortizing Features
otherNonAmortizingFeatures.description: Indicate if the covered loan or application includes contractual terms other than contractual terms described in § 1003.4(a)(27)(i), (ii), and (iii) that would allow for non-amortizing payments during the loan term by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

propertyValue.label: Property Value
propertyValue.description: Enter the value of the property, in dollars, securing the covered loan or, in the case of an application, proposed to secure the covered loan relied on in making the credit decision.

manufacturedPropertyType.label: Manufactured Home Secured Property Type
manufacturedPropertyType.description: Indicate whether the covered loan or application is, or would have been, secured by a manufactured home and land or by a manufactured home and not land, by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

manufacturedLandInterest.label: Manufactured Home Land Property Interest
manufacturedLandInterest.description: Indicate the applicant’s or borrower’s land property interest in the land on which a manufactured home is or will be located by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

dwellingUnits.label: Total Units
dwellingUnits.description: Enter in numeral form, the number of individual dwelling units related to the property securing the covered loan or, in the case of an application, proposed to secure the covered loan.

multifamilyAffordableUnits.label: Multifamily Affordable Units
multifamilyAffordableUnits.description: Enter, in numeral form, the number of individual dwelling units related to the property securing the covered loan or, in the case of an application, proposed to secure the covered loan are income-restricted pursuant to Federal, State, or local affordable housing programs.

applicationChannel.label: Submission of Application
applicationChannel.description: Indicate whether the applicant or borrower submitted the application directly to your institution by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Not submitted directly to your institution

initiallyPayableToYourInstitution.label: Initially Payable to Your Institution
initiallyPayableToYourInstitution.description: Indicate whether the covered loan was, or whether an application would have been, initially payable to your institution by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Not initially payable to your institution

mloID.label: Mortgage Loan Originator NMLSR Identifier
mloID.description: Enter the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry mortgage loan originator unique identifier (NMLSR ID).

aus.label: Automated Underwriting System
aus.description: Indicate the automated underwriting system (AUS) used by your institution to evaluate the application by selecting up to five (5) of the applicable Code(s) from the following:

codes.description: Technology Open to Approved Lenders (TOTAL) Scorecard

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 5: Other
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 5 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

ausResult.label: Automated Underwriting System Result
ausResult.description: Indicate the result generated by the automated underwriting system (AUS) previously listed by selecting the applicable Code(s) from the following:

conditional.id: Conditional Free Form Text Field for Code 16: Other
conditional.description: This field will only contain a value if Code 16 is selected. Otherwise, leave it blank.

reverseMortgage.label: Reverse Mortgage
reverseMortgage.description: Indicate whether the covered loan is, or the application is for, a reverse mortgage by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

openEndLineOfCredit.label: Open-End Line of Credit
openEndLineOfCredit.description: Indicate whether the covered loan is, or the application is for, an open-end line of credit as defined in § 1003.2(o) by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Not an open-end line of credit

businessPurpose.label: Business or Commercial Purpose
businessPurpose.description: Indicate whether the covered loan, or the application for a covered loan, is primarily for a business or commercial purpose by selecting the applicable Code from the following:

codes.description: Primarily for a business or commercial purpose
Not primarily for a business or commercial purpose
